Castiglioncello was originally an Etruscan village, situated at the foot of the

hills.The beauty of its hills, bays and pinewood has inspired artists and painters, in particular the painters of the Macchiaioli school. It is known as "the pearl of the Tyrrhenian". Castiglioncello sea has been awarded a blue flag by the European Union.

value: content=Localit√† San Quirico, Fortullino, Castiglioncello (Li). The old Farmhouse San Quirico, placed near "Poggio san Quirico" (312 metres above sea-level) offers 6 indipendent apartments in a typical Tuscany ancient structure, between woods and sea. The Farmhouse is located 30 minutes from Livorno.
